eus.julenugalde.mvcnotepad.controller

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MVCNotepadController

    public interface Controller

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int EXISTING_DATA_SOURCE
      Data will be stored in an existing data source
      static int MODEL_DATABASE
      The text will be stored in a database
      static int MODEL_NETWORK
      The text will be stored in a network device
      static int MODEL_TEXT_FILE
      The text will be stored in a text file in the user's device
      static int NEW_DATA_SOURCE
      Data will be stored in a new data source
      static int SWING_VIEW
      The application will be displayed as a Swing GUI

    • Method Detail

      • loadModel

        void loadModel(int modelType,
               String source)
        Loads the specified model
        Parameters:
        modelType - Model type to be used: MODEL_TEXT_FILE, MODEL_DATABASE or MODEL_NETWORK.
        source - Model's data source

      • initializeView

        void initializeView(int viewType)
        Loads the specified view
        Parameters:
        viewType - View type to be used, currently only SWING_VIEW implemented.
